resources.string: How to add barcode items. Header.
How to add barcode items. Header.
Your cart recognizes items you put in it.
Your cart recognizes items you put in it.

Face barcodes towards any of the cart’s 4 sensors located in each corner of the cart. The cart’s lights will turn green and a beep sound will play. This means the cart recognizes the item and you can place the item in the cart.

Face barcodes towards the cart’s barcode scanner located behind the tablet screen. The cart’s lights will turn green and a beep sound will play. This means the cart recognizes the item and you can place the item in the cart.
Don’t hold the item too close to a sensor. Please allow at least 3 inches, or the length of a credit card, between the barcode and sensor so the sensor can recognize the item.
Don’t hold the item too close to the barcode scanner. Please allow at least three inches, or the length of a credit card, between the barcode and scanner so the scanner can recognize the item.
Don’t hold item\ntoo close to sensor
First time using the new Caper Cart?
The produce code may be on a sign or on a sticker attached to the item.
Before placing produce into cart, tap “Add item” on the cart screen. And then enter the produce code.
Place your items in the cart. The bottom of Caper Cart is also a scale.
Tap the item you want to add
Or search for the item here
Than tap the item you\'re adding
Tap \"Add item…\"\nwhen you\'re ready to add produce
Remove cart from stack to start
